notes.text:
This update for ntfs-3g_ntfsprogs fixes the following issue:

- CVE-2023-52890: fix a use after free in ntfs_uppercase_mbs (bsc#1226007)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: NTFS-3G before 75dcdc2 has a use-after-free in ntfs_uppercase_mbs in libntfs-3g/unistr.c. NOTE: discussion suggests that exploitation would be challenging.
notes.title: CVE description
